name: MLCDeviceType
desc: A device type for execution of a neural network.

items.name: case any
items.desc: A device type that represents either the CPU or GPU.

items.name: case cpu
items.desc: A device type that represents the CPU.

items.name: case gpu
items.desc: A device type that represents the GPU.

items.name: case ane
items.desc: A device type that represents the Apple Neural Engine.
